titleStmt.title: An act against preachers at conventicles and these present at field conventicles ; An act anent the covenant
titleStmt.author: Scotland.
Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings Most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "Act anent the covenant" was formerly identified separately as Wing S1044; Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) identifies this item as part of S1028.
